Great little spot just a spit away from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral, which if you don't know what that is, then you haven't been to Barcelona.  This place introduced me to Tapas.  I opted for the buffet, which was a bargain considering how hungry I was.  Some of the tapas included fresh fish which are housed in glass with temperature control to keep fresh.  Staff was exceedingly friendly.  And if your looking for good english speaking, stay home.  I visited three countries and tried my hand at Italian, French and Spanish and got everything I needed.  Top grade especially considering convenience to a tourist site, low cost relatively speaking (once again, very close to a major tourist site, think about it!) , and speed of the meal when you opt for the buffet!
